text: Baruch Mordechai Ezrachi (27 March 1929 â€“ 26 October 2023) is an Israeli rabbi. He is the Rosh Yeshiva of Ateres Yisrael in Bayit Vegan in Jerusalem, and a member of the Degel Hatorah Moetzas Gedolei Yisrael. Baruch Mordechai Ezrachi died on 26 October 2023, at the age of 94. ==References== Category:1929 births Category:2023 deaths Category:Israeli rabbis
title: Baruch Mordechai Ezrachi
